summary:
When this mod is activated, no matter where you go, all the NPCs around you will be naked.....
It works like Vampiric Aura or Armor Aura.
descriptionHtml:
*****************Description******************
When this mod is activated, no matter where you go, all the NPCs around you will be naked.....
It works like Vampiric Aura or Armor Aura.

*After you leave the map or the system go pass 3 days, the NPCs will put there clothes on again.

****************************************************
step1: press \"Delete\" button on your keyboard to activate or inactivate this mod 
step2: run.......

       
You can close the Aura by pressing Delete button again.

******************Installation******************


1. Script Dragon files are included in my files already.
2. Or you can Install Script Dragon from the below link
  http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__st__20
3. Place Undress Aura.asi and Undress Aura.ini along with the other two files into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

******************Uninstalling******************
Delete Undress Aura.asi and Undress Aura.ini

******************Credit******************
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Andy Stark
